title: A Busy Week
description: Mark talks about his busy week and his plans for next week.
speaker: Mark
text: Last week was very busy for me.
On Monday, I worked late at the office and finished an important project.
On Tuesday, I met a client and we talked about future plans.
On Wednesday, I stayed at home because I was tired.
I watched a movie and cooked dinner.
Next week will also be busy.
I am going to visit my parents on Saturday, and I will help them with some work.
I hope next week will be better and less stressful.
